title.value: Wagner Diabetic Foot Ulcer Classification System value set

description.value: The set of codes that define specialized diabetic foot ulcer grades according to the Wagner system. These are temporary codes and will be replaced by Solor SNOMED CT codes when available.

copyright.value: Used by permission of HL7 International, all rights reserved Creative Commons License

display.value: Grade 1 – superficial ulcer of skin or subcutaneous tissue
Grade 2 – ulcers extend into tendon, bone, or capsule
Grade 3 – deep ulcer with osteomyelitis, or abscess
